EmailTemplate.name: Exchange Inquiry Confirmation - We've received your request for a SPEX order
EmailTemplate.subject: Exchange Inquiry Confirmation {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
AOG Inquiry Confirmation
Hello {!Case.Contact_Name__c},
We’re glad to hear from you!
Thanks for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support.
We’ve already started working on your AOG issue and will soon get you flying again. Our team will stay in contact with you and provide updates until your AOG is resolved. Questions
We’ll connect all of your AOG details through the subject line of this email. So please leave the subject line unchanged, should you reply, to make sure your response is routed immediately to this team. Or you can call us at 1.800.601.3099 (US/ Canada). Choose option 4 when prompted.
Thanks again, we appreciate your business! Honeywell AOG Team Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com <http://www.myaerospace.com/> 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099, option 4 ORIGINAL CORRESPONDENCE: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
